sections.TOP: Saltspear014307d93topu1i4z3ax0mijampdglvh5zc041496852014-06-28T23:50:33ZSon Of Fire24907634The '''Saltspear''' is an inlet in [[the North]]. It is located in [[Blazewater Bay]] and west of [[Moat Cailin]].<ref>Season 2 Bluray: War of the Five Kings feature</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Saltspear is fed by the Fever River, a river in [[the Neck]]. It opens into Blazewater Bay.
